description: Try our easy to follow Kimchi Green Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Rice,Kale,Low sugar,Spinach
name: Kimchi Green Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: Cook brown rice following packet directions. Set aside.

Meanwhile, place eggs in a saucepan of cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and gently boil, uncovered, for 7 minutes. Drain and cool under cold running water. Peel and halve.

Separately blanch snow peas and both beans in boiling water for 1 minute each. Refresh in cold water. Peel avocado and cut into wedges. Divide rice among serving bowls, top with vegetables, avocado, kimchi, spring onion and boiled egg.
Whisk rice wine vinegar, sesame oil and sesame seeds together. Spoon over bowls and serve.
